ValidationRule.description: Once an E-list campaign is active prevent more members from being added.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNEW() , Campaign.IsActive , Campaign.Parent.Name= 'Parent Sales Rep E-List', Not( BEGINS($Profile.Name, 'System Administrator')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Once the Active checkbox is checked, the list has been sent to NSS and members can no longer be added. Please create a new Campaign and add your additional members to the new Campaign.
